hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price consolidates within 5% of 20-day high, a breakout above consolidation with volume >1.5x 20-day average signals transition from NEUTRAL to BULL regime with 85% probability of 8%+ move within 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression during price consolidation near highs represents energy accumulation. Breakout with volume confirms institutional participation and regime transition rather than false breakout. Historical data shows 2016, 2019, 2023 similar patterns preceded 15-25% bull runs.
entry_conditions: BTC price within 5% of 20-day high for ≥7 days
BTC breaks above consolidation high with volume >1.5x 20-day average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% gain from entry OR regime transitions to BULL (confirmed by 5-day momentum > 2%)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 35% of such breakouts fail to sustain >5% gains within 5 days OR result in immediate reversal to BEAR regime (5-day momentum < -2%).
